entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
